summary.body: Hi A comment on the last restaurants thread prompted this query... Can anyone recommend good take-aways that deliver here? We've been here 5 years and only got take away delivery once from 'deliverance' which was good but pricey. I really miss take-outs! No shortage of great eating spots out and about of course...but some nights you just want to stay in!! Many thanks
summary.subject: local take-away food?

summary.body: I have my sister, with her husband and 2 very active boys aged 5 and 9, visiting this weekend. The boys' favourite food are lasagna and spaghetti (preferably with half left on the carpet   ).  Given my pathetic cooking skills, are there any local restaurants you can recommend? Or would you recommend a take away instead?
summary.subject: Restaurants suitable for young kids

summary.body: Does anyone have any recommendations for takeaways that deliver to the Barbican?
summary.subject: Too lazy to cook

summary.body: Can anyone recommend a good take-away that delivers round here?
summary.subject: Empty cupboards but raining and very lazy!
